title: Kostadin Kostadinov
text:
Email Twitter Github Scholar ORCID


Hello! I’m Kostadin Kostadinov – a medical doctor, assistant professor and researcher in the department of Social Medicine and Public Health, Plovdiv, Bulgaria. I have a strong background in internal medicine, epidemiology, heath policy and economics. I love data analysis and statistical methods, primarily using R and Python. I’m also passionate about teaching public health and epidemiology. I’m a big fan of open-source software and I’m always looking for ways to contribute to the community.
